import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";

import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Retrieve all connected S3 buckets</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/log-shipping/s3-buckets"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns a list of all S3 buckets connected to your Logz.io account.

## Request

<div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem","paddingBottom":".5rem"}}>Array [</div></li><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"accessKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket access key","example":"ee07df5801500745419c6dff"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"secretKey"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket secret key","example":"506d891fe2163a511b450eddc3279539f6"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"arn"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Amazon Resource Name (ARN) to uniquely identify the S3 bucket. To generate a new ARN, create a new IAM Role in your AWS admin console."}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"bucket"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"AWS S3 bucket name","example":"AWS bucket"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"prefix"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Prefix of the AWS S3 bucket","example":"AWSLogs/7364988021587/myprefix"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"active"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":true,"description":"If `true`, the S3 bucket connector is active and logs are being fetched to Logz.io. If `false`, the connector is disabled.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"addS3ObjectKeyAsLogField"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"boolean","default":false,"description":"If `true`, enriches logs with a new field detailing the S3 object key.","example":true}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"region"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`US_EAST_1`, `US_EAST_2`, `US_WEST_1`, `US_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_1`, `EU_WEST_2`, `EU_WEST_3`, `EU_CENTRAL_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_1`, `AP_NORTHEAST_2`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_1`, `AP_SOUTHEAST_2`, `SA_EAST_1`, `AP_SOUTH_1`, `CA_CENTRAL_1`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Specify one supported AWS region.","enum":["US_EAST_1","US_EAST_2","US_WEST_1","US_WEST_2","EU_WEST_1","EU_WEST_2","EU_WEST_3","EU_CENTRAL_1","AP_NORTHEAST_1","AP_NORTHEAST_2","AP_SOUTHEAST_1","AP_SOUTHEAST_2","SA_EAST_1","AP_SOUTH_1","CA_CENTRAL_1"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"logsType"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`elb`, `vpcflow`, `S3Access`, `cloudfront`]"} schema={{"type":"string","enum":["elb","vpcflow","S3Access","cloudfront"],"description":"Specifies the log type being sent to Logz.io. Determines the parsing pipeline used to parse and map the logs. [Learn more about parsing options supported by Logz.io](/user-guide/log-shipping/built-in-log-types.html).","example":"elb"}}></SchemaItem><li><div style={{"fontSize":"var(--ifm-code-font-size)","opacity":"0.6","marginLeft":"-.5rem"}}>]</div></li></ul></details></TabItem><TabItem label={"Example (from schema)"} value={"Example (from schema)"}><ResponseSamples responseExample={"[\n  {\n    \"accessKey\": \"ee07df5801500745419c6dff\",\n    \"secretKey\": \"506d891fe2163a511b450eddc3279539f6\",\n    \"arn\": \"string\",\n    \"bucket\": \"AWS bucket\",\n    \"prefix\": \"AWSLogs/7364988021587/myprefix\",\n    \"active\": true,\n    \"addS3ObjectKeyAsLogField\": true,\n    \"region\": \"US_EAST_1\",\n    \"logsType\": \"elb\"\n  }\n]"} language={"json"}></ResponseSamples></TabItem></SchemaTabs></TabItem></MimeTabs></div></TabItem></ApiTabs></div></div>
